body:
Comment 1: 
Please export GOTRACEBACK=2 in the environment before running your server. When it gets
into this mode, please try kill -ABRT. Perhaps that will be useful, perhaps not. 

In the ktrace, when it stops looping, does it start sleeping with nanosleep(2)?

This could be caused by the new scheduler but I don't quite know how.
_Labels changed: added **priority-later**, removed **priority-triage**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
